name: LUV.IM A Friendship Experience
description:
This is my entry for #LoveJam, given the theme of love and romance I decided to build a small 10 minute text based experienced around two new characters I created specifically for this Jam.

All of the artwork, programming and testing were done by myself over the past weekend. This may be an idea that I will come back to in the future, I'm not 100% sure yet but the idea of interacting with characters through 2000s IM does intrigue me.

Perhaps if you enjoy this experience consider donating a cup of coffee via itch to keep me fueled up for more Gam Jams :D
